title: Would RIOT ban for ShadowPlay?
body: I use it when playing, but never really thought of it possibly coming up as a false positive.

replies.body: This isn't something that would get you banned currently, but in general keep in mind that we don't support any third party programs or mods.  This means we can't really provide any support for technical issues that might happen or any malicious content that could be hidden within them.  As another rule of thumb, what we're really focused on tackling is anything that could cause an unfair competitive advantage.  Our stance can also be found in this [guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848).  I hope that helps clear things up!
